alert.note: Alert for Shasta (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 5:29PM PDT until May 23 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Shasta County in northern California... * Until 615 PM PDT. * At 528 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lakehead-Lakeshore, or 13 miles north of Shasta Dam, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sugarloaf, Lakehead-Lakeshore and Lakehead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Large hail and damaging winds and cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
